00017 CFont::CFont() :
00018 m_FontSurface(NULL),
00019 m_ColouredSurface(NULL),
00020 m_fgcolour(0x0),
00021 m_bgcolour(0x0),
00022 m_monochrome(false)
00023 {
00024  //m_widthtable.assign(256,8);
00025  memset(&m_widthtable, 8, 256);
00026 }
00027 
00028 bool CFont::CreateSurface(SDL_Color *Palette, Uint32 Flags, Uint8 bpp, Uint16 width, Uint16 height)
00029 {
00030  if(m_FontSurface) SDL_FreeSurface(m_FontSurface);
00031  if(m_ColouredSurface) SDL_FreeSurface(m_ColouredSurface);
00032  m_FontSurface = SDL_CreateRGBSurface(Flags, width, height, bpp, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00033 
00034  if(bpp == 8)
00035  {
00036   SDL_SetColors(m_FontSurface, Palette, 0, 255);
00037   SDL_SetColorKey(m_FontSurface, SDL_SRCCOLORKEY, COLORKEY);
00038  }
00039 
00040  m_ColouredSurface = SDL_DisplayFormat(m_FontSurface);
00041 
00042  return (m_FontSurface != NULL && m_ColouredSurface != NULL );
00043 }
00044 
00045 bool CFont::optimizeSurface()
00046 {
00047  if(!m_monochrome)
00048  {
00049   if(m_FontSurface)
00050   {
00051    SDL_Surface *temp_surface;
00052    temp_surface = SDL_DisplayFormat(m_FontSurface);
00053    SDL_FreeSurface(m_FontSurface);
00054    m_FontSurface = temp_surface;
00055    SDL_SetColorKey(m_FontSurface, SDL_SRCCOLORKEY, 0x0);
00056 
00057    temp_surface = SDL_DisplayFormat(m_ColouredSurface);
00058    SDL_FreeSurface(m_ColouredSurface);
00059    m_ColouredSurface = temp_surface;
00060   }
00061  }
00062  return true;
00063 }

00069 bool CFont::loadHiColourFont( const std::string& filename )
00070 {
00071  if(!IsFileAvailable(filename))
00072   return false;
00073 
00074  if(m_FontSurface)
00075  {
00076   SDL_Surface *temp_surface = SDL_LoadBMP(GetFullFileName(filename).c_str());
00077   if(temp_surface)
00078   {
00079    SDL_Surface *displaysurface = SDL_ConvertSurface(temp_surface, m_FontSurface->format, m_FontSurface->flags);
00080    SDL_BlitSurface(displaysurface, NULL, m_FontSurface, NULL);
00081    SDL_FreeSurface(displaysurface);
00082    SDL_FreeSurface(temp_surface);
00083    return true;
00084   }
00085  }
00086  return false;
00087 }

00089 // This sets the width of the characters so the text is printed nicely.
00090 // This is by default 8 pixels in vorticons and it is normally only used
00091 // in the galaxy engine.
00092 void CFont::setWidthToCharacter(Uint8 width, Uint16 letter)
00093 {
00094  m_widthtable[letter] = width;
00095 }
00096 
00097 /**
00098  * \brief This function defines, that we have a monochrome fontmap
00099  *    Vorticon engine uses a 8x8 tilemap for printing the fonts.
00100  *    As it has other characters, it can never be monochrome
00101  *    The Galaxy engine uses monochrome because it derives the other
00102  *    colours by tricking around with palette in our case...
00103  * \param value set true if the fontmap is monochrome, else false
00104  */
00105 void CFont::setMonochrome(bool value)
00106 { m_monochrome = value; }
00107 
00108 void CFont::setBGColour(SDL_PixelFormat* p_pixelformat, Uint32 bgcolour, bool force)
00109 {
00110  if(m_monochrome)
00111  {
00112   SDL_Color *p_Color = m_FontSurface->format->palette->colors;
00113 
00114   if( m_bgcolour != bgcolour || force ) // For the Background
00115    SDL_GetRGB(bgcolour, p_pixelformat, &p_Color[0].r, &p_Color[0].g, &p_Color[0].b);
00116  }
00117 }
00118 
00119 // Sets the colour used for printing the text
00120 void CFont::setFGColour(SDL_PixelFormat* p_pixelformat, Uint32 fgcolour, bool force)
00121 {
00122  if(m_monochrome)
00123  {
00124   SDL_Color *p_Color = m_FontSurface->format->palette->colors;
00125 
00126   if( m_fgcolour != fgcolour || force ) // For the Foreground
00127   {
00128    SDL_GetRGB(fgcolour, p_pixelformat, &p_Color[15].r, &p_Color[15].g, &p_Color[15].b);
00129    SDL_SetColors( m_FontSurface, p_Color, 0, 16);
00130    m_fgcolour = fgcolour;
00131   }
00132  }
00133  else
00134  {
00135   if( m_fgcolour != fgcolour || force )
00136   {
00137    m_fgcolour = fgcolour;
00138    SDL_FillRect(m_ColouredSurface, NULL, m_fgcolour);
00139    SDL_BlitSurface(m_FontSurface, NULL, m_ColouredSurface, NULL);
00140   }
00141  }
00142 }
00143 
00144 //
00145 Uint32 CFont::getColour()
00146 {
00147  return m_fgcolour;
00148 }
00149 
00150 /**
00151  * \brief Retrieves the background colour of the font map
00152  * \param highlighted The fontmap has two background colours.
00153  *          One is highlighted (default gray)
00154  *        The other is not (default white)
00155  *        Those colours normally differ in mods.
00156  */
00157 
00158 Uint32 CFont::getBGColour(bool highlighted)
00159 {
00160  const int height = highlighted ? 10 : 2;
00161 
00162  SDL_LockSurface(m_ColouredSurface);
00163 
00164  Uint8* pixel = (Uint8*) m_ColouredSurface->pixels + height*8*m_ColouredSurface->pitch;
00165  Uint32 pixel32;
00166 
00167  memcpy(&pixel32, pixel, m_ColouredSurface->format->BytesPerPixel);
00168 
00169  Uint8 r,g,b;
00170  SDL_GetRGB(pixel32, m_ColouredSurface->format, &r, &g, &b);
00171 
00172  SDL_UnlockSurface(m_ColouredSurface);
00173 
00174  return SDL_MapRGB(m_ColouredSurface->format, r, g, b);
00175 }
00176 
00177 void CFont::getBGColour(bool highlighted, Uint8 *r, Uint8 *g, Uint8 *b)
00178 {
00179  Uint32 colour = getBGColour(false);
00180  SDL_GetRGB(colour, m_ColouredSurface->format, r, g, b);
00181 }

00183 ////////////////////////////
00184 ///// Drawing Routines /////
00185 ////////////////////////////
00186 void CFont::drawCharacter(SDL_Surface* dst, Uint16 character, Uint16 xoff, Uint16 yoff)
00187 {
00188  SDL_Rect scrrect, dstrect;
00189  
00190  scrrect.x = (m_ColouredSurface->w/16)*(character%16);
00191  scrrect.y = (m_ColouredSurface->h/16)*(character/16);
00192  scrrect.w = dstrect.w = (m_widthtable[character]);
00193  scrrect.h = dstrect.h = (m_ColouredSurface->h/16);
00194  dstrect.x = xoff; dstrect.y = yoff;
00195  
00196  if(m_monochrome)
00197   SDL_BlitSurface(m_FontSurface, &scrrect, dst, &dstrect);
00198  else
00199   SDL_BlitSurface(m_ColouredSurface, &scrrect, dst, &dstrect);
00200 }
00201 
00202 void CFont::drawFont(SDL_Surface* dst, const std::string& text, Uint16 xoff, Uint16 yoff, bool highlight)
00203 {
00204  unsigned int i,x=xoff,y=yoff;
00205 
00206  if(text.size() != 0)
00207  {
00208   for(i=0;i<text.size();i++)
00209   {
00210    unsigned char c = text[i];
00211 
00212    if ( !endofText( text.substr(i) ) )
00213    {
00214     if(highlight) c |= 128;
00215 
00216     drawCharacter(dst, c, x, y);
00217 
00218     x+=m_widthtable[c];
00219    }
00220    else
00221    {
00222     x=xoff;
00223     y+=8;
00224    }
00225   }
00226  }
00227 }
00228 
00229 void CFont::drawMap(SDL_Surface* dst)
00230 {
00231  SDL_BlitSurface(m_FontSurface,NULL,dst,NULL);
00232 }

00234 ///
00235 // Destruction Routines
00236 ///
00237 void CFont::destroySurface(){
00238  if(m_FontSurface) SDL_FreeSurface(m_FontSurface);
00239  if(m_ColouredSurface) SDL_FreeSurface(m_ColouredSurface);
00240  m_ColouredSurface = m_FontSurface = NULL;
00241 }
